amp.gis-layers-manager:title: GIS Layers Manager
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-MeasureLa: The type of value, for example %, $, per capita.
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-ExportInd: Enter the measures for each location in the labeled column next to the respective location. If Indicator Layer Type is "Ratio (% of Population)" or "Ratio (other)" please enter either in decimal format. Save the spreadsheet and re-upload in the next step
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-NumberofC: The map will divide the range of values into subranges. This allows you to specify the number of intervals, and the map will automatically determine the class breaks based on the value range.
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-ColorSche: The color scheme used to identify the intervals on the map for this indicator layer.
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-Notes[tit: Any relevant information, including source data.
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-Number: Number of Classes should be greater than 0
amp.gis-layers-manager:message-CouldNotI: Could not import file. Please check the file format.
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-Indica: Indicator data required. Please import indicator data before proceeding to the next step
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-LayerW: There is another layer with the specified layer name. Layer name must be unique.
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-NameMi: Name of layer in the imported file does not match the name of the current layer
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-Locati: Location was not found. Please check the location IDs in the file.
amp.gis-layers-manager:Info-PublicLayerS: It appears you have not logged into the system. This layer will be stored in the browser for 12 hours.
amp.gis-layers-manager:hint-PopulationLa: Please designate the population layer for each administrative division. The list has been limited to "Count" layers.
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-MoreCl: There are more classes than values in re-imported excel file
amp.gis-layers-manager:validation-Classe: The number of classes exceeds the number of colors in the selected palette. For multi-color palettes the number of classes should be less or equal to the number of colors.
amp.gis-layers-manager:PopulationLayer-E: A server error occurred while setting the population layers
amp.gis-layers-manager:Admin-ConfirmDele: Are you sure you want to delete?
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-zero-cate: Enabling this option creates a separate category for zero on the map legend
amp.gis-layers-manager:tooltip-re-import: Supports MS Excel (.xls) files only. The order of the columns should be same as those in the template downloaded in the 'Export File' step.
